description.p: This is a test to see if my RSS feed updates. No reason it shouldn't. You can read my blog posts at koshkov.github.io/blog
If you don't have an RSS reader or are looking for a different service, I would highly reccomend newsboat. Newsboat is terminal based RSS reader that can be found in most Linux repos.
It will display all blog posts in plain text. If you like reading your news in a a minimal environment, newsboat is for you. That is all for now.

item.title: Why have a website?
item.description:

Site navigation and other adminstrative information located here
